[Teacher]: waiting for me when I came back I never got to play any other sport than baseball because it was just my one love. I was never in any kind of school or anything and I never had a lot of money. I was always good at baseball, but I never learned how to read or write very well. I never read or write very well. text:
[Starter]: Do you have any pets? How long have you had them, and what do you like most about them?
[Student]: You dont know anything about all that except my dogs
[Teacher]: , Max and Bella, but I'll tell me about them. I've had Max and Bella for about 3 years now. Max is a golden retriever and Bella is a poodle mix. They're both such great companions. Max is the more energetic of the two, always wanting to run around and play fetch. Bella is a bit more laid back, but she loves to cuddle and get belly rubs. I love watching them interact with each other - they're so adorable. Max
[Student]: has friends in school who say he doesnt want anyone else to know his name and wants to be there as well Bella says its her favorite experience for us and that we are quite unselfish of him or our own husband but I think that she will not let on as much as we do because she knows lots about everybody people who work at home their parents and neighbours and her children Bella also likes to take care of her baby when she sees how good she
[Teacher]: is at looking after us and I think she is very proud of her role. Max loves to go on car rides with us and Bella enjoys the same too. But both of them bring so much joy to our lives and I would not trade them for anything in the world. I love how they always keep us on our toes and make us laugh. They're such a big part of our lives and I'm so grateful to have them.  It sounds like you have two wonderful pets who bring a lot
